subject: Running
organizations: Circle of Friends New York Mini
lead_paragraph: The defending champion Lornah Kiplagat led all the way in winning the Circle of Friends New York Mini 10K yesterday, capturing the women's road race in Central Park for the third time in four years.
snippet: The defending champion Lornah Kiplagat led all the way in winning the Circle of Friends New York Mini 10K yesterday, capturing the women's road race in Central Park for the third time in four years.
